{"id":1190482060,"question_id":3278,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 week, 4 days","timestamp":1709285026,"status":11,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/1190482060/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find the Number of Ways to Place People I","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    bool chk(int i, int j, auto & points){\n        int xl = points[i][0], xr = points[j][0];\n        int yl = points[j][1], yr = points[i][1];\n        for(int x = i + 1; x < j; x++){\n            int tx = points[x][0], ty = points[x][1];\n            if(xl <= tx && tx <= xr && yl <= ty && ty <= yr) return false;\n        }\n        return true;\n    }\n    int numberOfPairs(vector<vector<int>>& points) {\n        sort(points.begin(), points.end(), [](vector<int> &a, vector<int> &b){\n            if(a[0] - a[1] != b[0] - b[1]){\n                return a[0] - a[1] < b[0] - b[1];\n            }\n            return a < b;\n        });\n        int ans = 0, n = points.size();\n        for(int i = 0; i < n - 1; i++){\n            for(int j = i + 1; j < n; j++){\n                if(points[i][0] - points[i][1] != points[j][0] - points[j][1]){\n                    ans += chk(i, j, points);\n                }\n            }\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-the-number-of-ways-to-place-people-i","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
